remarks: A Hilbert lattice is atomic, i.e. any nonzero element is greater than or equal to some atom.  Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 140.  Also Definition 3.4-2 in [MegPav2000] p. 2345 (PDF p. 8).  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hatomic $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ A =/= 0H ) -> E. x e. HAtoms x C_ A ) $.
$d A x $.
